nodes.title: Allows adding/not adding an Entity by an EntityListener
rename core > ashley for cleaner deployment/structure
Use Gwt safe casts and ClassReflection methods
Mavenized/Gradle'ized so we can push snapshots and releases.
corrected some javadoc and simplified java calls
Refactor unit test cases for EntityTests
a better test to show use of EntitySystem.checkProcessing()
Small change to make ashley compatible with JDK 1.6
Added beforeUpdate and afterUpdate to IteratingSystem
Added some documentation to get started
Update libGDX to 1.10.0 and Java Source to 1.7 and create utility functions for iterating systems
IntervalSystem remove final modifier on update(dt) method
fixed bug causing items not to be removed because of incorrect size
Engine adds and remove entities and systems with Varargs
Update dependencies configuration to last supported configuration by gradle.
Update gradle to 5.4 and libgdx to 1.9.9
Only free a component once in `removeInternal`
Added a removeAllSystems() method for issue #257
fix cascade operations in listeners while updating
Added methods to remove all entities of a family
fix remove out of bounds component from entity, fix libgdx/ashley#252
Added a configurations map to the engine
Added RenderSystem for easier Entity Rendering
Added addAndReturn for easier Component Manipulation
Added a new update method for updating only a certain range of systems
Provide Unit Test for Issue #214 Engine.getEntitiesFor() during EntityListener.entityRemoved
Split updating into updatePhysics, update and interpolate to make using a fixed timestep easier
Track and Report times of each EntitySystem.update() if requested
Unit test for EntityListeners that add and remove components.
Process delayed removal and addition of entities without exception
Splits Engine implementation into multiple classes #178
Allow temporary enable and disable of components on an Entity
Call listeners if component is added inside another listener
DO NOT MERGE => I want to test Jenkins PR job.
Make update method of IntervalSystem to be final
Missed a couple more functions that needed to be final for html/gwt compile...
Made static members final so it's compatible with GWT.
Added getter methods for Family in some built-in systems
Forcing sort in SortedIteratingSystem when removing entity - fixed
Forcing sort in SortedIteratingSystem when removing entity fron unordered array
Fixed pools always returning new component
Pooling with reset for ComponentOperation & EntityOperation
Internals of Engine.update are protected instead of private.
Unit test for double entity removal
Unit test for double entity removal
Complementary maven POM (Not suggesting replacing gradle with maven)
Marking entities about to be removed, avoiding multiple removal
Fixed the Array creation when registering a new Family. Before the Arrays were created as Object Array...
Implemented the Iterable interface for ImmutableArray.
Entity id generation bound to engine.
Entity.hashcode compatible to java versions prior to 8.
Fix javadoc bug for java version prior to 8.
Entity component listeners now return the related component
Adding a SortedIteratingSystem and unit tests
Fixes crash when trying to remove an invalid component from a PooledEntity #77
Fixes #70: PooledEntity: entity not fully reset
Add method to retrieve systems in the engine
#50: Add convenience Entity.getFor(Class<? extends Component>) method
